page.title: 18HOLIDAYMAKING
page.content: People come to this area for their holidays in the summer. The families of three children in our school have holiday cottages which they let, two have caravan areas on their land and one takes in people for bed and breakfast. The charges vary, but it costs about Â£100 a week to rent a cottage, Â£1 a night for a caravan, and Â£6.50 a night for an adult staying for bed and breakfast. Every two years a caravan club comes to one of our farms, and then there are about thirty caravans on the site. Across the road from our school is a large building called the Koppers. It used to be a three star hotel, but has closed down this year and is going to be an old people's home.
